com.doowybbob.MRServer

Class ServerLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doowybbob.MRServer.ServerLib

  • public class ServerLib
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerLib contains helper methos for the server class. The Server handles communication with the client and uses ServerLib to interact with the host computer's mouse and keyboard.
    Author:
    Bobby

      • moveMouseBy

        public static void moveMouseBy(int dX,
               int dY)
                        throws java.awt.AWTException
        Move the mouse pointer by some delta values in the X and Y direction.
        Parameters:
        dX - amount to move in the X (left/right) direction
        dY - amount to move in the Y (up/down) direction
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException

      • typeString

        public static void typeString(java.lang.String s)
                       throws java.awt.AWTException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        To emulate the keyboard, strings must be converted into their equivalent key strokes. These keystrokes are sent one at a time to emulate typing.
        Parameters:
        s -
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • click

        public static void click(int i)
                  throws java.awt.AWTException
        Emulate a mouse click. Handles both left and right click.
        Parameters:
        i - value for 1 for left click, value of 2 for right click.
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException

      • scroll

        public static void scroll(int i)
                   throws java.awt.AWTException
        Emulate the mouse wheel scroll.
        Parameters:
        i - How many "clicks" from the scroll wheel to emulate.
        Throws:
        java.awt.AWTException
